import { useImmerState } from '@shrugsy/use-immer-state' import React from 'react' interface Props { handleSaveVariation: any templateData: any } const SaveVariation: React.FC = ({ handleSaveVariation, templateData }) => { const [variationData, setVariationData] = useImmerState({ name: "untitled", face: "#FF0000" }) return (
​
setVariationData(prev => { prev.name = e.target.value })} />
Current face:

Select face:

{templateData.palette.map((item, index) => (
setVariationData(prev => { prev.face = item.color })} >
))}
) } export default SaveVariation
